long_description: The Jansport Air Cure daypack comfortably hauls your laptop and daily essentials for trips across campus, downtown or overseas. Yoke-style, perforated foam shoulder straps provide lightweight, breathable support; fully padded back panel protects your body from the pack's contents. Dual main compartments allow you to separate and organize gear, folders and books; built-in padded sleeve fits up to 15 in. laptop computers. External cord-management zip pocket keeps cords separate and tangle-free. Top zip pocket gives you quick access to small items; side mesh pockets are perfect for a water bottle or overflow, quick-access storage. Padded haul handle makes off-back carrying easy on the hands. Carries textbooks, laptop computer, paperback books, spiral notebooks, calculator, pens and pencils, bag lunch, phone and music player and a sweatshirt. The JanSport Air Cure laptop pack is made of 600-denier polyester and 420-denier nylon to withstand the rigors of daily use.
short_description: The Jansport Air Cure daypack comfortably hauls your laptop and daily essentials for trips across campus, downtown or overseas.
